Author: internerderner2
Text: I can only tell you that before my ED I used to eat about 140-150 g of sugary cereals washed down with 1 liter of whole-fat milk.  During snacks.  Not at meals. During snacks. In a single day! And I was NOT overweight at all!  And then my ED decided that I needed to starve myself :(

Author: rowurboat22
Text: Same!! Just went to a restaurant I haven’t been to since before this shit started and I got what I normally get there and was shocked I used to easily eat the whole portion without even thinking about it or feeling like it’s a lot of food.
